template.name: sessionche
template.value: proxies = { 'http': "http://bc-cls03.ccla.com.au:3128", 'https': "http://bc-cls03.ccla.com.au:3128", } # ensure certifi installed and replacement CA Certificate in # ".\Anaconda3\Lib\site-packages\certifi\cacert.pem" # file in emails and can be retreved from chrome omnibar session = requests.Session() session.proxies = proxies conn = session.get($URL$) conn.text $END$
template.description: requests session with CHE Proximity proxies

template.name: pipche
template.value: pip install --trusted-host pypi.python.org --trusted-host files.pythonhosted.org --trusted-host pypi.org --proxy http://bc-cls03.ccla.com.au:3128 $PACKAGE_NAME$
template.description: pip install code for behind a with CHE Proximity proxy
